Wrapper documentation¶

Author:Felix Belanger Robillard
class bibwrap.BiBlerWrapper[source]¶
static addEntry(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs the corresponding EntryDict

Parameters:bibtex (str) – The BibTeX string to be processed.
Returns:The written Entry from the BibTeX
Return type:EntryDict
static exportString(bibtex, format)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a string to the specified format

Parameters:bibtex (str) – The BibTeX string to be processed.
Returns:String to specified format
Return type:string
static formatBibtex(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a formatted BibTeX

Parameters:bibtex (str) – The BibTeX string to be processed.
Returns:BibTeX entry
Return type:str
static getBibTeX(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs the corresponding corrected BibTeX string

Parameters:bibtex (str) – The BibTeX string to be processed.
Returns:The corrected BibTeX including overriden key
Return type:str
static previewEntry(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs an HTML preview

Parameters:bibtex (str) – The BibTeX string to be processed.
Returns:HTML preview for the entry
Return type:str
static validateEntry(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs 1 if the entry is valid or 0 if it’s not

Parameters:bibtex (str) – The BibTeX string to be processed.
Returns:Number of valid entries, which will be 0 or 1
Return type:int
